$interpreted: Fredrica: Handsome~Did you find anything?
Jerome: Please don't call me that, general. You can refer to me as officer, or just call me Jerome.
Fredrica: Don't be so stubborn~ It feels more intimate this way~
Jerome: Tsk...I got all the information you requested. The soldiers who took Ned away belong to the Healy family.
Fredrica: The Healy family, whose territory is near the desert? Although they are a minor noble family, they do indeed own private forces...
Jerome: Ned was reported by a merchant for being involved in terrorist activities and attempting to cause harm to the Kingdom of the Sun.
Jerome: Because of that, he was taken to the nearby Healy family hall for questioning.
Fredrica: If this case involves nobles, then it's going to be tricky, even for me...
Lisa: ...*sob*... Ned...
Fredrica: Stop crying. When faced with a situation like this, we females have to remain strong for the sake of the family!
Fredrica: Think back carefully. Did your husband do anything abnormal before all this occurred?
Lisa: Ned is an honest hunter. There's no way he...
Lisa: ... Wait... A few days ago, Ned said he got an "easy request". All he needed to do was deliver a package with a fellow hunter and he'll get paid...

Fredrica: Hmm... Hiring a hunter to do non-hunting work?
Do you know where this fellow hunter lives?
Lisa: I do. I can take you there!
Fredrica: Handsome, are you not coming?
Jerome: General Lucien, we still have to report back to King Theodore. We don't have time to waste on such a minor incident!
Fredrica: Love is the most sacred thing in the world! How dare you call it "minor"!
Fredrica: Every person who desires loves must conquer one challenge after another.

Fredrica: Uncertainty, sweetness, pain, sadness...people have to experience a string of emotions before they can finally find the right person. 
Even then, that's just the midway point of the journey.
Fredrica: I've been looking for the right person forever but could never find him.
Fredrica: Therefore, I can't just stand on the sidelines and watch someone who already found their partner have their happy lives ruined!
Jerome: But King Theodore...
Fredrica: It's just a bickering between uncle and niece. If anything happens, I'll take full responsibility. Since you're my assistant officer, you follow MY orders!
Lisa: The person who delivered the package with Ned is right ahe...
Hunter: Help! You guys! I don't care who you are, please help me!
Lisa: That's him! The person who delivered the package with Ned!
Fredrica: Then we couldn't let him get eaten like that. Handsome!
Hunter: Military outfits...guess I can't escape the Kingdom army no matter what I do...
Jerome: What do you mean by that? Are there other members of the Kingdom army trying to hunt you down!?
Fredrica: So something is indeed fishy. Speak, how did you frame Ned!
Hunter: I-I didn't do it on purpose.
Hunter: All I did was steal a relatively cheap bronze medal from the package we got in exchange from the lizardman...
Fredrica: Lizardman?

Model.Text: Handsome~Did you find anything?
Please don't call me that, general. You can refer to me as officer, or just call me Jerome.
Don't be so stubborn~ It feels more intimate this way~
Tsk...I got all the information you requested. The soldiers who took Ned away belong to the Healy family.
The Healy family, whose territory is near the desert? Although they are a minor noble family, they do indeed own private forces...
Ned was reported by a merchant for being involved in terrorist activities and attempting to cause harm to the Kingdom of the Sun.
Because of that, he was taken to the nearby Healy family hall for questioning.
If this case involves nobles, then it's going to be tricky, even for me...
Stop crying. When faced with a situation like this, we females have to remain strong for the sake of the family!
Think back carefully. Did your husband do anything abnormal before all this occurred?
Ned is an honest hunter. There's no way he...
... Wait... A few days ago, Ned said he got an "easy request". All he needed to do was deliver a package with a fellow hunter and he'll get paid...

Hmm... Hiring a hunter to do non-hunting work?
Do you know where this fellow hunter lives?
I do. I can take you there!
Handsome, are you not coming?
General Lucien, we still have to report back to King Theodore. We don't have time to waste on such a minor incident!
Love is the most sacred thing in the world! How dare you call it "minor"!
Every person who desires loves must conquer one challenge after another.

Uncertainty, sweetness, pain, sadness...people have to experience a string of emotions before they can finally find the right person. 
Even then, that's just the midway point of the journey.
I've been looking for the right person forever but could never find him.
Therefore, I can't just stand on the sidelines and watch someone who already found their partner have their happy lives ruined!
But King Theodore...
It's just a bickering between uncle and niece. If anything happens, I'll take full responsibility. Since you're my assistant officer, you follow MY orders!
The person who delivered the package with Ned is right ahe...
Help! You guys! I don't care who you are, please help me!
That's him! The person who delivered the package with Ned!
Then we couldn't let him get eaten like that. Handsome!
Military outfits...guess I can't escape the Kingdom army no matter what I do...
What do you mean by that? Are there other members of the Kingdom army trying to hunt you down!?
So something is indeed fishy. Speak, how did you frame Ned!
I-I didn't do it on purpose.
All I did was steal a relatively cheap bronze medal from the package we got in exchange from the lizardman...
Lizardman?
